check-in-page.header.title: CHECK-IN
check-in-page.title: RETRIEVE YOUR BOOKING
check-in-page.subtitle: You can find your booking by filling out your family name and the booking code in your booking confirmation.
check-in-page.family-name.error.minlengt: The family name must contain at least 2 characters
check-in-page.family-name.error.maxlengt: The family name exceeded the length of 30 characters
check-in-page.booking-code.error.minleng: The booking code must contain atleast 5 characters
check-in-page.booking-code.error.maxleng: The booking code exceeded the length of 6 characters
check-in-page.booking-code.error.pattern: The booking code can only contain alphabetical characters and the numbers 2~9
check-in-page.error.not-found: No booking found with this booking code and family name.
check-in-page.error.unavailable: No bookings could be fetched at this time.
check-in-page.error.unknown: Something went wrong while trying to get the booking.
